content.question: Which of the following processes is most likely to occur as a result of an animal cell receiving a signal to initiate apoptosis?

choices.label: Ribosomes will translate mRNA to produce proteins.
Vesicles will release extracellular growth factors via exocytosis.
Lysosomes will release digestive enzymes into the cytosol.
Vacuoles will fuse with the cellular membrane.

content.answer: Lysosomes will release digestive enzymes into the cytosol.
